Name: Coloring Game
About the game: Coloring Game is a fantastic anti-stress game. Animate the pixel picture by coloring it in full! Three playing modes. Numbered pixels and highlighting the coloring area; Numbered pixels only; Highlighting the coloring area only. The picture gets animated when the level is completed. The game features a great array of additional tools which facilitate the coloring process: Instant moving of the coloring area by clicking on the Navigator; Selection of color by clicking the right mouse button; Easy line coloring when holding the Shift button; Opportunity to cancel any action by pressing the “Z” button. 15 free levels. [/]
